title: February Metal TypeNews
content:
The monthly video newsletter of printers’ nostalgia website Metal Type is now out.

As promised, this month’s video has been filmed in a “typical” English pub (albeit on a quiet Wednesday lunchtime!)

Click the link below to take a look:  
 [February Metal Type News](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211102707/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17)

All the Best  
Dave Hughes

METAL TYPE  
Yesterday’s Technology . . . Today!  
 [http://www.metaltype.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211102707/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/)

author: MetalType
